entity.name: diary
entity.query: select * from diary left outer join diary_image using (diary_id)
entity.deltaImportQuery: select * from diary left outer join diary_image using (diary_id) where diary_id = '${dataimporter.delta.ID}'
entity.deltaQuery: select diary_id as ID from diary where sys_extract_utc(to_timestamp (to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))) > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'
